correction_response: This tweet is potentially misleading. It seems to be based on an article that suggests Bankman-Fried may have accidentally eaten shrimp due to a menu mix-up. However, the number "3000" appears to be an exaggeration or speculation, as the article does not provide concrete evidence to support this claim.
note_1_text: This is a fake headline satirizing that Sam Bankman-Fried "accidentally" lost customer funds, claiming not to know what had happened to them.
note_2_text: It would appear that this tweet is satire, referencing Bankman-Fried's recent comments around the mishandling / fraud at FTX.    https://www.google.com/search?q=Emails+and+text+messages+reveal+the+30-year-old+entrepreneur+may+have+%22accidentally%22+eaten+as+many+as+3%2C000+shrimp+in+a+%22menu+mix-up%22+blamed+on+%22outside+food+procurement+issues.%22.&source=hp&ei=q_yIY_aULp7ZytMPmPalsA4&iflsig=AJiK0e8AAAAAY4kKu1ebfa3kLpzDasvx4Vs-WBqaqpgX&ved=0ahUKEwi2ls-LkNn7AhWerHIEHRh7CeYQ4dUDCAw&uact=5&oq=Emails+and+text+messages+reveal+the+30-year-old+entrepreneur+may+have+%22accidentally%22+eaten+as+many+as+3%2C000+shrimp+in+a+%22menu+mix-up%22+blamed+on+%22outside+food+procurement+issues.%22.&gs_lcp=Cgdnd3Mtd2l6EANQAFgAYM4DaABwAHgAgAEAiAEAkgEAmAEAoAECoAEB&sclient=gws-wiz

tweet_image2text: An article claiming that Bankman-Fried "may not have been" vegan for at least the last 17 months. It suggests that due to a "menu mix-up" blamed on "outside food procurement issues", the entrepreneur may have "accidentally" eaten as many as 3,000 shrimp.
tweet_text: How do you accidentally eat 3000 shrimp? https://t.co/oZWVEBY9iw
user_description: Ambassador of tech optimism. Co-founder of Stacks. Engineer & investor.
